      • getInstance

        public static GeoLocation getInstance(double longitude,
                                      double latitude)
        You should use this method to get an instance. It will find the instance in the Map, otherwise it will create the instance with given coordinates and put it in the Map
        Parameters:
        longitude - the longitude
        latitude - the latitude
        Returns:
        an instance of GeoLocation with given coordinates

      • getGMTHourOffset

        public int getGMTHourOffset()
        This method will retrieve the hour offset from GMT
        Returns:
        the hour offset from GMT ranging from -12 to 11

      • compareTo

        public int compareTo(GeoLocation other)
        This method compares two instance of this class, and return an int based on the coordinates of the instances
        Specified by:
        compareTo in interface java.lang.Comparable<GeoLocation>
        Parameters:
        other - the other GeoLocation instance to be compared with
        Returns:
        a positive number if the time offset is greater than the other one's; a negative number if the time offset is less than the other one's 100 if the latitude is greater than the other one's; -100 if the latitude is less than the other one's ; 0 if their coordinates are equal

      • distance

        public static double distance(GeoLocation location1,
                              GeoLocation location2)
        This method compute the shortest distance between given locations
        Parameters:
        location1 - a GeoLocation instance
        location2 - another GeoLocation instance
        Returns:
        The distance in km between the two location

      • generate

        public static GeoLocation generate(double longitude,
                                   double latitude)
        This is the static factory method which will work for any numbers passed. For numbers out of range, they should be converted to valid range
        Parameters:
        longitude - the longitude
        latitude - the latitude
        Returns:
        an instance of GeoLocation
